name: krow communications Ltd
description:
krow is an independent creative communications agency founded in 2005 by Barry Cook, Nick Hastings, John Quarrey and Malcolm White. We are driven by a passion to achieve the right outcome for our clients.
To do that we work backwards. We start with the outcome our clients’ needs. Then we work out what behavior we must generate in order to reach that outcome. Working backwards means that we can always draw a direct line between the work and what we’re trying to achieve.
